title: Architect Designed House for Sale
details:
This property located in a tranquil environment in Akuregoda Lake Road-Pelawatte is now on sale.

The house was designed by a reputed architectural firm built in 2013 and comes with following features & facilities.

Land Extent 10 Perches
Floor Area 4,000sqft with Cut- Cemented flooring
3 Storied House with 5 Bedroom + 5 Bathrooms equipped with "Hans Grohe" fittings,
Each floor has a Living Room/Spac
Pantry/ Kitchen
Garage with Rollar Gate
Provisions for AC/ Hot water in Place
Piped Music System covering 15 points

Following to be Done as per buyers requirement:-
Need to do closets for rooms
Bathrooms: doors in space below sinks
Need to paint and a good clean up
Get three phase/ install hot water/ install ACs

Owners Quoted Selling Price :- LKR 55 Million

Check our properties on Facebook too by visiting Elankaventures Facebook page.

NO BROKERS PLEASE
